description: '''Baithak Gana''' ([[Sarnami]]: बैठक गाना, بیتک گانا) is a form of music originating in [[Suriname]] by the [[Indo-Surinamese]] community. Baithak is a social gathering. It is a mix of [[Hindustani classical music|Hindustani]] [[Indian folk music|folk music]] with other [[Caribbean]] influences. It is similar to [[Chutney music]] that originated in [[Trinidad and Tobago]]. The most popular exponent in Surinam of the genre were [[Ramdew Chaitoe]] and [[Dropati]].
